topic.topicDialog: Once you've submitted work to your teacher for marking, you can use Kerboodle to view their overall marks and comments.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, access the course from which the assignment was set.

A summary will appear in the Results panel on the course page, this will show your overall mark for the assignment.

Click on the assignment title for more information.
The assignment window will then open and any comments your teacher has made will appear in the comments section.
If you've completed a Test Yourself activity as part of the assignment, use the Menu bar to access the test.
A full report screen will then appear showing your Test Yourself results.
